database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: UPS2 Orbitrap data from Dicker, Lin and Ivanov (PMID: 20823122)
entry.description: These raw data were first introduced in "Increased Power for the Analysis of Label-free LC-MS/MS Proteomics Data by Combining Spectral Counts and Peptide Peak Attributes" by Lee Dicker, Xihong Lin, and Alexander R. Ivanov (PubMed ID 20823122) (doi 10.1074/mcp.M110.002774). They represent the Sigma UPS2 proteins (a high-dynamic range mixture of 48 purified human proteins) introduced to the instrument at different concentrations.
